description: This file implements event handler functions for reactivity to folder-related events within the System Setup Manager component. The functions manage responses to folder additions, deletions, modifications, and related events, although their actual implementations are placeholders returning success status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoReactRfoAdded(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles the event when a folder is added to the system repository. Currently a placeholder that returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoReactRfoDeleted(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles the event when a folder is deleted from the system repository. Currently a placeholder that returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoReactRroAdded(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles the event when a related object (RRO) is added. Currently a placeholder that returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoReactRroModified(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles the event when a related object (RRO) is modified. Currently a placeholder that returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoReactRroDeleted(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles the event when a related object (RRO) is deleted. Currently a placeholder that returns success.
